name: Ghostwalk Spider
movement: 50 feet walking speed, climbs difficult surfaces effortlessly
description: The Ghostwalk Spider is a large, predatory spider with remarkable stealth, capable of shifting between ghostly and physical forms.
memorable: This spider can move through objects, becoming invisible to effectively ensnare its prey with ghostly webs.
goals: To ambush and capture prey, using cunning tactics and stealth.
relations: Related to other monstrous spiders and undead creatures, often inhabiting dark, eerie environments.
environment: Typically found in dark forest areas or abandoned ruins where it can conceal itself.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances evasion and stealth, and resistance to numerous damage types while in ghostly form.
weaknesses: Low Charisma and Intelligence affect social interactions and resistance to certain magical effects.
attacks: Can perform a Bite attack dealing piercing damage with a chance of poisoning, or use Ghostly Snare to restrain and hide targets.
most_powerful_ability: Ghostly Body provides extensive resistances and immunities in ghost form, while also allowing for incorporeal movement through objects.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet and a passive Perception of 16, enhancing its hunting abilities.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Perception, making it highly adept at ambush tactics.
additional_information: Has the ability to teleport between ghostly and true forms.
Immunities to being grappling or paralyzed.
Can move through difficult terrain without penalty.
Deals additional poison damage in true form.

spider immune to grappled and paralyzed conditions
huge spider with deadly bite and ghostly snare
stealthy spider that can walk through walls
